Uses of Class
pulse.search.math.Segment

  • Packages that use Segment 
    Package Description
    pulse.search.linear
    Provides classes that are able to search for the minimum of a scalar function of a vector variable that is unimodal on a specific Segment.
    pulse.search.math
    Provides general math functionality that is used when finding the direction (a Vector) of the minimum, including operations with vector and matrices.

    • Uses of Segment in pulse.search.linear

      Methods in pulse.search.linear that return Segment 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Segment LinearSolver.domain​(IndexedVector x, Vector p)
      Sets the domain for this linear search on p.

    • Uses of Segment in pulse.search.math

      Constructors in pulse.search.math with parameters of type Segment 
      Constructor Description
      Segment​(Segment segment)
      Copies segment
